short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to view new messages in vk.com and stay them unread. Do not need your credentials
short.ru: Позволяет просматривать новые сообщения в vk.com, остявляя их не прочитанными. Не требует логин/пароль

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple application that allows you to watch new messages. If you want to see new messages but dont want that sender will know that you have read it, just hover the preview.
Also you can see all text of message in search tool. 
The best solution for some kind of paranoid, careful and curious people.
Do not need your credentials.
long.ru:
Simple application that allows you to watch new messages. If you want to see new messages but dont want that sender will know that you have read it, just hover the preview.
The best solution for some kind of paranoid, careful and curious people.
Works for new and old versions of vk.com
